特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】英語Iｄ　１８（経済学部）/英語IIｂ　１８（経済学部）
授業方法: The text will be followed quite closely. Classes will usually begin with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair work.

第1回:
Course overview; Start of Fall Term - Discussion Questions (two rounds); instructor's schedule.
Paul's Rules & Requests. Unit 5, pp.46-49.
Review. Buy text (if necessary). Text, pp. 46, #1B, 47#3B, 48#1D
第3回: Text & CD, unit 5, pp. 50-51. Unit 6, p. 53.
第4回: Text & CD, unit 5, pp. 50-51, unit 6, pp. 54-55.
第7回: Midterm (listening) exam. Text & CD, unit 6, pp. 55-61.
第8回: Return midterm exams. Text & CD, unit 6, pp. 60-61. Unit 7, p. 65.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and (when appropriate) review.
